TextLibrary.Text: Sir Albion
Father! I came as soon as I got your message.
Father! I came as soon as I got your message.
Father! I came as soon as I got your message.
Father! I came as soon as I got your message.
You are looking well, my son. The training in Bartonia obviously agrees with you. We have missed you here in Siria.
You are looking well, my son. The training in Bartonia obviously agrees with you. We have missed you here in Siria.
You are looking well, my daughter. The training in Bartonia obviously agrees with you. We have missed you here in Siria.
You are looking well, my daughter. The training in Bartonia obviously agrees with you. We have missed you here in Siria.
The Queen sends her regards.
The Queen sends her regards.
The Queen sends her regards.
The Queen sends her regards.
Queen Gwendholyn is a good person. Even as a young girl she was very kind and fair.
Queen Gwendholyn is a good person. Even as a young girl she was very kind and fair.
Queen Gwendholyn is a good person. Even as a young girl she was very kind and fair.
Queen Gwendholyn is a good person. Even as a young girl she was very kind and fair.
Why did you send for me? Is everything okay?
Why did you send for me? Is everything okay?
Why did you send for me? Is everything okay?
Why did you send for me? Is everything okay?
Yes, yes. But I found something odd in the west tower and I wanted to give it to you personally.
Yes, yes. But I found something odd in the west tower and I wanted to give it to you personally.
Yes, yes. But I found something odd in the west tower and I wanted to give it to you personally.
Yes, yes. But I found something odd in the west tower and I wanted to give it to you personally.
The west tower? That was where grandfather lived...
The west tower? That was where grandfather lived...
The west tower? That was where grandfather lived...
The west tower? That was where grandfather lived...
Yes. It was so long ago, I'm surprised you remember him. I found an old broken shield in there with a message from him. It said that the shield was to be given to you.
Yes. It was so long ago, I'm surprised you remember him. I found an old broken shield in there with a message from him. It said that the shield was to be given to you.
Yes. It was so long ago, I'm surprised you remember him. I found an old broken shield in there with a message from him. It said that the shield was to be given to you.
Yes. It was so long ago, I'm surprised you remember him. I found an old broken shield in there with a message from him. It said that the shield was to be given to you.
A broken shield?
A broken shield?
A broken shield?
A broken shield?
Yes. It seems like such a trivial matter; to call you back from Bartonia almost seems wasteful. But it was one of his last wishes, and he was a brave man. He deserves to have those wishes honored.
Yes. It seems like such a trivial matter; to call you back from Bartonia almost seems wasteful. But it was one of his last wishes, and he was a brave man. He deserves to have those wishes honored.
Yes. It seems like such a trivial matter; to call you back from Bartonia almost seems wasteful. But it was one of his last wishes, and he was a brave man. He deserves to have those wishes honored.
Yes. It seems like such a trivial matter; to call you back from Bartonia almost seems wasteful. But it was one of his last wishes, and he was a brave man. He deserves to have those wishes honored.
Thank you, father. It is always good to see you, and to see Siria again.
Thank you, father. It is always good to see you, and to see Siria again.
